name: TrackBee Connect
author: TrackBee

sections.description:
This plugin is currently in closed beta testing. To stay informed and be the first to know when it’s officially released to the public, please reach out to us via the chat on trackbee.io.

Our experienced developers made it possible to get ad platform tracking without any hassle. What does the TrackBee Connect app do exactly, you may ask? Streamlined stability and security: Integrate and iterate without client-side limitations, like network connectivity or ad blocker issues. Maximize event measurement: Capture more events with improved accuracy across different browsers, apps and devices to get a unified view of your customer\’s journey from page view to purchase.

  • Improve insight in the ad performance
  • Improve the ad optimisation
  • Know your target audience faster

External Service Usage

Our plugin relies on external services provided by TrackBee to function effectively. Specifically, we use the TrackBee API to setup the connection between the plugin and the TrackBee app. Once the connection is made the TrackBee API is used to track and analyze user behavior on your website.

  • TrackBee API Service: https://api.trackbee.ai or https://api.trackbee.io
  • Privacy Policy: TrackBee Privacy Policy
  • Terms of Service: TrackBee Terms of Service

Please review these documents to understand how your data is handled and to ensure compliance with legal requirements pertaining to data transmission and privacy.

short_description: Connect to TrackBee for the best tracking and data-driven opportunities.
